verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician לְדָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> of David מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm שִֽׁיר׃ <S%H7892><s%> [or] Song יָק֣וּם <S%H6965><s%> arise אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> Let God יָפ֣וּצוּ <S%H6327><s%> be scattered אוֹיְבָ֑יו <S%H341><s%> let his enemies וְיָנ֥וּסוּ <S%H5127><s%> him flee מְ֝שַׂנְאָ֗יו <S%H8130><s%> let them also that hate מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

כְּהִנְדֹּ֥ף <S%H5086><s%> is driven away עָשָׁ֗ן <S%H6227><s%> As smoke תִּ֫נְדֹּ֥ף <S%H5086><s%> [so] drive [them] away כְּהִמֵּ֣ס <S%H4549><s%> melteth דּ֭וֹנַג <S%H1749><s%> as wax מִפְּנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> before אֵ֑שׁ <S%H784><s%> the fire יֹאבְד֥וּ <S%H6><s%> perish רְ֝שָׁעִ֗ים <S%H7563><s%> [so] let the wicked מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> at the presence אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> of God

וְֽצַדִּיקִ֗ים <S%H6662><s%> But let the righteous יִשְׂמְח֣וּ <S%H8055><s%> be glad יַֽ֭עַלְצוּ <S%H5970><s%> let them rejoice לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> God וְיָשִׂ֥ישׂוּ <S%H7797><s%> rejoice בְשִׂמְחָֽה׃ <S%H8057><s%> yea let them exceedingly

שִׁ֤ירוּ ׀ <S%H7891><s%> Sing לֵֽאלֹהִים֮ <S%H430><s%> unto God זַמְּר֪וּ <S%H2167><s%> sing praises שְׁ֫מ֥וֹ <S%H8034><s%> to his name סֹ֡לּוּ <S%H5549><s%> extol לָרֹכֵ֣ב <S%H7392><s%> him that rideth בָּ֭עֲרָבוֹת <S%H6160><s%> upon the heavens בְּיָ֥הּ <S%H3050><s%> JAH שְׁמ֗וֹ <S%H8034><s%> by his name וְעִלְז֥וּ <S%H5937><s%> and rejoice לְפָנָֽיו׃ <S%H6440><s%> before

אֲבִ֣י <S%H1><s%> A father יְ֭תוֹמִים <S%H3490><s%> of the fatherless וְדַיַּ֣ן <S%H1781><s%> and a judge אַלְמָנ֑וֹת <S%H490><s%> of the widows אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> [is] God בִּמְע֥וֹן <S%H4583><s%> habitation קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <S%H6944><s%> in his holy

אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> God מ֘וֹשִׁ֤יב <S%H3427><s%> setteth יְחִידִ֨ים ׀ <S%H3173><s%> the solitary בַּ֗יְתָה <S%H1004><s%> in families מוֹצִ֣יא <S%H3318><s%> he bringeth out אֲ֭סִירִים <S%H615><s%> those which are bound בַּכּוֹשָׁר֑וֹת <S%H3574><s%> with chains אַ֥ךְ <S%H389><s%> Only ס֝וֹרֲרִ֗ים <S%H5637><s%> but the rebellious שָׁכְנ֥וּ <S%H7931><s%> dwell צְחִיחָֽה׃ <S%H6707><s%> in a dry

אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> O God בְּ֭צֵאתְךָ <S%H3318><s%> when thou wentest forth לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before עַמֶּ֑ךָ <S%H5971><s%> thy people בְּצַעְדְּךָ֖ <S%H6805><s%> when thou didst march בִֽישִׁימ֣וֹן <S%H3452><s%> through the wilderness סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

אֶ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> The earth רָעָ֨שָׁה ׀ <S%H7493><s%> shook אַף־ <S%H637><s%> also שָׁמַ֣יִם <S%H8064><s%> the heavens נָטְפוּ֮ <S%H5197><s%> also dropped מִפְּנֵ֪י <S%H6440><s%> at the presence אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> of God זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> itself סִינַ֑י <S%H5514><s%> [even] Sinai מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> [was moved] at the presence אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

גֶּ֣שֶׁם <S%H1653><s%> rain נְ֭דָבוֹת <S%H5071><s%> a plentiful תָּנִ֣יף <S%H5130><s%> didst send אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> Thou O God נַחֲלָתְךָ֥ <S%H5159><s%> thine inheritance וְ֝נִלְאָ֗ה <S%H3811><s%> when it was weary אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> You כֽוֹנַנְתָּֽהּ׃ <S%H3559><s%> whereby thou didst confirm

חַיָּתְךָ֥ <S%H2416><s%> Thy congregation יָֽשְׁבוּ־ <S%H3427><s%> hath dwelt בָ֑הּ תָּ֤כִ֥ין <S%H3559><s%> hast prepared בְּטוֹבָתְךָ֖ <S%H2896><s%> of thy goodness לֶעָנִ֣י <S%H6041><s%> for the poor אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> therein thou O God

אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> The Lord יִתֶּן־ <S%H5414><s%> gave אֹ֑מֶר <S%H562><s%> the word הַֽ֝מְבַשְּׂר֗וֹת <S%H1319><s%> of those that published צָבָ֥א <S%H6635><s%> [was] the company רָֽב׃ <S%H7227><s%> great

מַלְכֵ֣י <S%H4428><s%> Kings צְ֭בָאוֹת <S%H6635><s%> of armies יִדֹּד֣וּן <S%H5074><s%> did flee יִדֹּד֑וּן <S%H5074><s%> apace וּנְוַת <S%H5116><s%> and she that tarried בַּ֝֗יִת <S%H1004><s%> at home תְּחַלֵּ֥ק <S%H2505><s%> divided שָׁלָֽל׃ <S%H7998><s%> the spoil

אִֽם־ <S%H518><s%> When תִּשְׁכְּבוּן֮ <S%H7901><s%> Though ye have lien בֵּ֪ין <S%H996><s%> among שְׁפַ֫תָּ֥יִם <S%H8240><s%> among the pots כַּנְפֵ֣י <S%H3671><s%> [yet shall ye be as] the wings י֭וֹנָה <S%H3123><s%> of a dove נֶחְפָּ֣ה <S%H2645><s%> covered בַכֶּ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> with silver וְ֝אֶבְרוֹתֶ֗יהָ <S%H3422><s%> with yellow בִּֽירַקְרַ֥ק <S%H84><s%> and her feathers חָרֽוּץ׃ <S%H2742><s%> gold

בְּפָ֘רֵ֤שׂ <S%H6566><s%> scattered שַׁדַּ֓י <S%H7706><s%> When the Almighty מְלָ֘כִ֤ים <S%H4428><s%> kings בָּ֗הּ תַּשְׁלֵ֥ג <S%H7949><s%> in it it was [white] as snow בְּצַלְמֽוֹן׃ <S%H6756><s%> in Salmon

הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> The hill אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> of God הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> [is as] the hill בָּשָׁ֑ן <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> hill גַּ֝בְנֻנִּ֗ים <S%H1386><s%> an high הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> [as] the hill בָּשָֽׁן׃ <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan

לָ֤מָּה ׀ <S%H4100><s%> Why תְּֽרַצְּדוּן֮ <S%H7520><s%> Why leap הָרִ֪ים <S%H2022><s%> mountains גַּבְנֻ֫נִּ֥ים <S%H1386><s%> ye ye high הָהָ֗ר <S%H2022><s%> the mountain חָמַ֣ד <S%H2530><s%> desireth אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> [which] God לְשִׁבְתּ֑וֹ <S%H3427><s%> to dwell in אַף־ <S%H637><s%> yet יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> yea the LORD יִשְׁכֹּ֥ן <S%H7931><s%> will dwell לָנֶֽצַח׃ <S%H5331><s%> [in it] for ever

רֶ֤כֶב <S%H7393><s%> The chariots אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God רִבֹּתַ֣יִם <S%H7239><s%> [are] twenty thousand אַלְפֵ֣י <S%H505><s%> [even] thousands שִׁנְאָ֑ן <S%H8136><s%> of angels אֲדֹנָ֥י <S%H136><s%> the Lord בָ֝֗ם סִינַ֥י <S%H5514><s%> [is] among them [as in] Sinai בַּקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> in the holy

עָ֘לִ֤יתָ <S%H5927><s%> Thou hast ascended לַמָּר֨וֹם ׀ <S%H4791><s%> on high שָׁ֘בִ֤יתָ <S%H7617><s%> captive שֶּׁ֗בִי <S%H7628><s%> thou hast led captivity לָקַ֣חְתָּ <S%H3947><s%> thou hast received מַ֭תָּנוֹת <S%H4979><s%> gifts בָּאָדָ֑ם <S%H120><s%> for men וְאַ֥ף <S%H637><s%> also ס֝וֹרְרִ֗ים <S%H5637><s%> yea [for] the rebellious לִשְׁכֹּ֤ן ׀ <S%H7931><s%> might dwell יָ֬הּ <S%H3050><s%> also that the LORD אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> God

בָּ֤ר֣וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed אֲדֹנָי֮ <S%H136><s%> [be] the Lord י֤וֹם ׀ <S%H3117><s%> daily י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> daily יַֽעֲמָס־ <S%H6006><s%> loadeth לָ֗נוּ הָ֘אֵ֤ל <S%H410><s%> us [with benefits even] the God יְֽשׁוּעָתֵ֬נוּ <S%H3444><s%> of our salvation סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

הָ֤אֵ֣ל ׀ <S%H410><s%> [He that is] our God לָנוּ֮ אֵ֤ל <S%H410><s%> [is] the God לְֽמוֹשָׁ֫ע֥וֹת <S%H4190><s%> of salvation וְלֵיהוִ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> and unto GOD אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> the Lord לַ֝מָּ֗וֶת <S%H4194><s%> from death תּוֹצָאֽוֹת׃ <S%H8444><s%> [belong] the issues

אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> Surely אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> But God יִמְחַץ֮ <S%H4272><s%> shall wound רֹ֤אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> the head אֹ֫יְבָ֥יו <S%H341><s%> of his enemies קָדְקֹ֥ד <S%H6936><s%> scalp שֵׂעָ֑ר <S%H8181><s%> [and] the hairy מִ֝תְהַלֵּ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> of such an one as goeth on still בַּאֲשָׁמָֽיו׃ <S%H817><s%> in his trespasses

אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> said אֲ֭דֹנָי <S%H136><s%> The Lord מִבָּשָׁ֣ן <S%H1316><s%> from Bashan אָשִׁ֑יב <S%H7725><s%> I will bring again אָ֝שִׁ֗יב <S%H7725><s%> I will bring [my people] again מִֽמְּצֻל֥וֹת <S%H4688><s%> from the depths יָֽם׃ <S%H3220><s%> of the sea

לְמַ֤עַן ׀ <S%H4616><s%> because of תִּֽמְחַ֥ץ <S%H4272><s%> may be dipped רַגְלְךָ֗ <S%H7272><s%> That thy foot בְּ֫דָ֥ם <S%H1818><s%> in the blood לְשׁ֥וֹן <S%H3956><s%> [and] the tongue כְּלָבֶ֑יךָ <S%H3611><s%> of thy dogs מֵאֹיְבִ֥ים <S%H341><s%> of [thine] enemies מִנֵּֽהוּ׃ <S%H4480><s%> They

רָא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> They have seen הֲלִיכוֹתֶ֣יךָ <S%H1979><s%> thy goings אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> O God הֲלִ֘יכ֤וֹת <S%H1979><s%> [even] the goings אֵלִ֖י <S%H410><s%> of my God מַלְכִּ֣י <S%H4428><s%> my King בַקֹּֽדֶשׁ׃ <S%H6944><s%> in the sanctuary

קִדְּמ֣וּ <S%H6923><s%> went before שָׁ֭רִים <S%H7891><s%> The singers אַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> [followed] after נֹגְנִ֑ים <S%H5059><s%> the players on instruments בְּת֥וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among עֲ֝לָמ֗וֹת <S%H5959><s%> [them were] the damsels תּוֹפֵפֽוֹת׃ <S%H8608><s%> playing with timbrels

בְּֽ֭מַקְהֵלוֹת <S%H4721><s%> in the congregations בָּרְכ֣וּ <S%H1288><s%> Bless אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> ye God יְ֝הוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD מִמְּק֥וֹר <S%H4726><s%> from the fountain יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> There בִּנְיָמִ֨ן ׀ <S%H1144><s%> Benjamin צָעִ֡יר <S%H6810><s%> There [is] little רֹדֵ֗ם <S%H7287><s%> [with] their ruler שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> the princes יְ֭הוּדָה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah רִגְמָתָ֑ם <S%H7277><s%> [and] their council שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> the princes זְ֝בֻל֗וּן <S%H2074><s%> of Zebulun שָׂרֵ֥י <S%H8269><s%> [and] the princes נַפְתָּלִֽי׃ <S%H5321><s%> of Naphtali

צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> hath commanded אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <S%H430><s%> Thy God עֻ֫זֶּ֥ךָ <S%H5797><s%> thy strength עוּזָּ֥ה <S%H5810><s%> strengthen אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> O God ז֝֗וּ <S%H2098><s%> that which פָּעַ֥לְתָּ <S%H6466><s%> thou hast wrought לָּֽנוּ׃

מֵֽ֭הֵיכָלֶךָ <S%H1964><s%> Because of thy temple עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> at יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> at Jerusalem לְךָ֤ יוֹבִ֖ילוּ <S%H2986><s%> bring מְלָכִ֣ים <S%H4428><s%> shall kings שָֽׁי׃ <S%H7862><s%> presents

גְּעַ֨ר <S%H1605><s%> Rebuke חַיַּ֪ת <S%H2416><s%> the company קָנֶ֡ה <S%H7070><s%> of spearmen עֲדַ֤ת <S%H5712><s%> the multitude אַבִּירִ֨ים ׀ <S%H47><s%> of the bulls בְּעֶגְלֵ֬י <S%H5695><s%> with the calves עַמִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> of the people מִתְרַפֵּ֥ס <S%H7511><s%> [till every one] submit בְּרַצֵּי־ <S%H7518><s%> himself with pieces כָ֑סֶף <S%H3701><s%> of silver בִּזַּ֥ר <S%H967><s%> scatter עַ֝מִּ֗ים <S%H5971><s%> thou the people קְרָב֥וֹת <S%H7128><s%> in war יֶחְפָּֽצוּ׃ <S%H2654><s%> [that] delight

יֶאֱתָ֣יוּ <S%H857><s%> shall come out חַ֭שְׁמַנִּים <S%H2831><s%> Princes מִנִּ֣י <S%H4480><s%> out מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt כּ֥וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> Ethiopia תָּרִ֥יץ <S%H7323><s%> shall soon stretch out יָ֝דָ֗יו <S%H3027><s%> her hands לֵאלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> unto God

מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <S%H4467><s%> ye kingdoms הָ֭אָרֶץ <S%H776><s%> of the earth שִׁ֣ירוּ <S%H7891><s%> Sing לֵאלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> unto God זַמְּר֖וּ <S%H2167><s%> O sing praises אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> unto the Lord סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

לָ֭רֹכֵב <S%H7392><s%> To him that rideth בִּשְׁמֵ֣י <S%H8064><s%> upon the heavens שְׁמֵי־ <S%H8064><s%> of heavens קֶ֑דֶם <S%H6924><s%> [which were] of old הֵ֥ן <S%H2005><s%> Behold יִתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> lo he doth send out בְּ֝קוֹלוֹ <S%H6963><s%> his voice ק֣וֹל <S%H6963><s%> voice עֹֽז׃ <S%H5797><s%> [and that] a mighty

תְּנ֥וּ <S%H5414><s%> Ascribe עֹ֗ז <S%H5797><s%> ye strength לֵֽאלֹ֫הִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> unto God עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> is over יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> [is] over Israel גַּאֲוָת֑וֹ <S%H1346><s%> his excellency וְ֝עֻזּ֗וֹ <S%H5797><s%> and his strength בַּשְּׁחָקִֽים׃ <S%H7834><s%> [is] in the clouds

נ֤וֹרָ֥א <S%H3372><s%> [thou art] terrible אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> O God מִֽמִּקְדָּ֫שֶׁ֥יךָ <S%H4720><s%> out of thy holy places אֵ֤ל <S%H410><s%> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel ה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> Himself נֹתֵ֨ן ׀ <S%H5414><s%> [is] he that giveth עֹ֖ז <S%H5797><s%> strength וְתַעֲצֻמ֥וֹת <S%H8592><s%> and power לָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> unto [his] people בָּר֥וּךְ <S%H1288><s%> Blessed אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> [be] God
